page.description: The .FIND_PREVIOUS() method finds the key before the specified key.

argument.name: Pointer
argument.description: A pointer to an existing query list entry.

page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P dim ptr as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "" qry = tbl.query_create() ptr = qry.find_last() ? qry.find_previous(ptr) = Key = "11112-01" Record = 5
